page.title: 19CREDITS HATHERDEN
page.content: The work for this block was undertaken by the junior class of the village school in Hatherden.Their ages ranged from 8 to 11 years.Their names are Louise Ray, Kate Harding, Sophia Halder, Amy Sturgess,Charlotte Knight,Paul Cree,Zoe Hunt, Karen Turpie,Julie Swain,Louise Williamson, Gemma Littlehales, Sarah Chilton, Leigh Balsdon,Wayne Breck,Neil Wood, Lisa Hams,Julia Shearn,Graham Cree, Addam Cunniffe, Matthew Halder, Chris Dunning,Daniel Webb,Mark Sturgess, Paul Wood,Paul Hewish,Scott Hunt, Ricky Balsdon and Richard Ray.
